description: Ytterbium is a soft rare-earth metal used in lasers, sensors, and alloy strengthening. Its compounds help stabilize stainless steel and support precision measurement devices. Ytterbium-based lasers offer high efficiency and are used in materials processing and scientific research. While not as widely known as some rare-earth elements, ytterbium remains important for specialized, high-tech applications.
name: Ytterbium
